messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: As another station was unable to manage it, we are requesting that the crew work to construct a large rage cage. Nanotrasen want to expand into sports broadcasting and we wish for you to construct the rage cage for the pilot. The rage cage must have shield walls, be large and have at least 2 hazards. Weapons and resources will be provided upon request for no charge.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A crate has been sent via cargo, please check it crew.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please read the note provided with the box.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheri:%ï¿½ MCayj^j<.3-BZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Today i will hold a great oof off. Firssst to make BEau to go oof by beening him, in a full bamboozle, winsss a ssslave.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are re-sending the crate, please remember to read the note provided.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Tell dad jokesss on commonsss for a prize

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The crate has been sent again, get it right and read the note this time

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please note that obstructing the construction of our new arena, colloquially known as a "rage cage" will result in your termination from employment.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a pack of wire eating mammals have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Assisting the construction of the rage cage in the bar will be met with monetary compensation, it is recommend all crew assist construction.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Assisting with construction of the arena in the bar will be met with company benefits if you provide significant help, this could be your pathway to a promotion.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Head of Security's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Clean the rage cage and prepare it for combat. Make weapon requests via the communications console and they will be delivered.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Alec Cooper. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Alec Cooper. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Weapons and a mech for the rage cage are being sent now

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Have the mech and weapons for the rage cage been received?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We found a spare syndicate sleeper, we left it by the rage cage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
